import time
import os

def file_watcher(filename):
    timestamp = os.path.getmtime(filename)
    
    while True:
        new_timestamp = os.path.getmtime(filename)
        if new_timestamp != timestamp:
            print(f"{filename} has been modified")
            timestamp = new_timestamp
        
        time.sleep(1)

file_watcher("example.txt")
